verses.verse: וַנֵּ֣פֶן <WH6437> Then we turned וַנַּ֔עַל <WH5927> and went up דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> the way הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <WH1316> to Bashan וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> came out עוֹג֩ <WH5747> and Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king הַבָּשָׁ֨ן <WH1316> of Bashan לִקְרָאתֵ֜נוּ <WH7125> against ה֧וּא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> all עַמּ֛וֹ <WH5971> us he and all his people לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to battle אֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <WH154> at Edrei

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֣א <WH3372> unto me Fear אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> כִּ֣י <WH3588> into בְיָדְךָ֞ <WH3027> into thy hand נָתַ֧תִּי <WH5414> him not for I will deliver אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> him and all his people וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> and his land וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> and thou shalt do לּ֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עָשִׂ֗יתָ <WH6213> unto him as thou didst לְסִיחֹן֙ <WH5511> unto Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> which dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּֽוֹן׃ <WH2809> at Heshbon

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <WH5414> delivered יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> So the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֜ינוּ <WH430> our God בְּיָדֵ֗נוּ <WH3027> into our hands גַּ֛ם <WH1571> also אֶת־ <WH853> ע֥וֹג <WH5747> Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> also the king הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> of Bashan וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> and all his people וַנַּכֵּ֕הוּ <WH5221> and we smote עַד־ <WH5704> until בִּלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> no הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <WH7604> him until none was left ל֖וֹ שָׂרִֽיד׃ <WH8300> to him remaining

וַנִּלְכֹּ֤ד <WH3920> And we took אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עָרָיו֙ <WH5892> all his cities בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> he לֹ֤א <WH3808> not הָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> become קִרְיָ֔ה <WH7151> there was not a city אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> did not לָקַ֖חְנוּ <WH3947> which we took מֵֽאִתָּ֑ם <WH853> שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> not from them threescore עִיר֙ <WH5892> cities כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֶ֣בֶל <WH2256> all the region אַרְגֹּ֔ב <WH709> of Argob מַמְלֶ֥כֶת <WH4467> the kingdom ע֖וֹג <WH5747> of Og בַּבָּשָֽׁן׃ <WH1316> in Bashan

כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> these עָרִ֧ים <WH5892> All these cities בְּצֻר֛וֹת <WH1219> [were] fenced חוֹמָ֥ה <WH2346> walls גְבֹהָ֖ה <WH1364> with high דְּלָתַ֣יִם <WH1817> gates וּבְרִ֑יחַ <WH1280> and bars לְבַ֛ד <WH905> alone מֵעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> towns הַפְּרָזִ֖י <WH6521> beside unwalled הַרְבֵּ֥ה <WH7235> many מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> a great

וַנַּחֲרֵ֣ם <WH2763> And we utterly destroyed אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> them עָשִׂ֔ינוּ <WH6213> them as we did לְסִיחֹ֖ן <WH5511> unto Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king חֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <WH2809> of Heshbon הַחֲרֵם֙ <WH2763> utterly destroying כָּל־ <WH3605> of every עִ֣יר <WH5892> of every city מְתִ֔ם <WH4962> the men הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <WH802> women וְהַטָּֽף׃ <WH2945> and children
וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַבְּהֵמָ֛ה <WH929> But all the cattle וּשְׁלַ֥ל <WH7998> and the spoil הֶעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> of the cities בַּזּ֥וֹנוּ <WH962> we took for a prey לָֽנוּ׃

וַנִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> out בָּעֵ֤ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִוא֙ <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land מִיַּ֗ד <WH3027> of the hand שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> of the two מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> kings הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> that [was] on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> Jordan מִנַּ֥חַל <WH5158> from the river אַרְנֹ֖ן <WH769> of Arnon עַד־ <WH5704> against הַ֥ר <WH2022> unto mount חֶרְמֽוֹן׃ <WH2768> Hermon

צִידֹנִ֛ים <WH6722> the Sidonians יִקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> call לְחֶרְמ֖וֹן <WH2768> ([Which] Hermon שִׂרְיֹ֑ן <WH8303> Sirion וְהָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> and the Amorites יִקְרְאוּ־ <WH7121> call ל֖וֹ שְׂנִֽיר׃ <WH8149> Senir

כֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> All the cities הַמִּישֹׁ֗ר <WH4334> of the plain וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַגִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> and all Gilead וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> and all Bashan עַד־ <WH5704> far סַלְכָ֖ה <WH5548> unto Salchah וְאֶדְרֶ֑עִי <WH154> and Edrei עָרֵ֛י <WH5892> cities מַמְלֶ֥כֶת <WH4467> of the kingdom ע֖וֹג <WH5747> of Og בַּבָּשָֽׁן׃ <WH1316> in Bashan

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for רַק־ <WH7535> but ע֞וֹג <WH5747> For only Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king הַבָּשָׁ֗ן <WH1316> of Bashan נִשְׁאַר֮ <WH7604> remained מִיֶּ֣תֶר <WH3499> of the remnant הָרְפָאִים֒ <WH7497> of giants הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold עַרְשׂוֹ֙ <WH6210> behold his bedstead עֶ֣רֶשׂ <WH6210> [was] a bedstead בַּרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> of iron הֲלֹ֣ה <WH3808> [is] it not הִ֔וא <WH1931> he בְּרַבַּ֖ת <WH7237> in Rabbath בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon תֵּ֧שַׁע <WH8672> was nine אַמּ֣וֹת <WH520> cubits אָרְכָּ֗הּ <WH753> [was] the length וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> thereof and four אַמּ֛וֹת <WH520> cubits רָחְבָּ֖הּ <WH7341> the breadth בְּאַמַּת־ <WH520> of it after the cubit אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> of a man

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֧רֶץ <WH776> And this land הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> we יָרַ֖שְׁנוּ <WH3423> [which] we possessed בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִ֑וא <WH1931> he מֵעֲרֹעֵ֞ר <WH6177> from Aroer אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is by נַ֣חַל <WH5158> which [is] by the river אַרְנֹ֗ן <WH769> Arnon וַחֲצִ֤י <WH2677> and half הַֽר־ <WH2022> mount הַגִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> Gilead וְעָרָ֔יו <WH5892> and the cities נָתַ֕תִּי <WH5414> thereof gave לָרֻֽאוּבֵנִ֖י <WH7206> I unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִֽי׃ <WH1425> and to the Gadites

וְיֶ֨תֶר <WH3499> And the rest הַגִּלְעָ֤ד <WH1568> of Gilead וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַבָּשָׁן֙ <WH1316> and all Bashan מַמְלֶ֣כֶת <WH4467> [being] the kingdom ע֔וֹג <WH5747> of Og נָתַ֕תִּי <WH5414> gave לַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> I unto the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> of Manasseh כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> all חֶ֤בֶל <WH2256> all the region הָֽאַרְגֹּב֙ <WH709> of Argob לְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> with all Bashan הַה֥וּא <WH1931> which יִקָּרֵ֖א <WH7121> was called אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> the land רְפָאִֽים׃ <WH7497> of giants

יָאִ֣יר <WH2971> Jair בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> of Manasseh לָקַח֙ <WH3947> took אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֶ֣בֶל <WH2256> all the country אַרְגֹּ֔ב <WH709> of Argob עַד־ <WH5704> far גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> unto the coasts הַגְּשׁוּרִ֖י <WH1651> of Geshuri וְהַמַּֽעֲכָתִ֑י <WH4602> and Maachathi וַיִּקְרָא֩ <WH7121> and called אֹתָ֨ם <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> after שְׁמ֤וֹ <WH8034> them after his own name אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּשָׁן֙ <WH1316> Bashan חַוֹּ֣ת יָאִ֔יר <WH2334> Havvoth-jair עַ֖ד <WH5704> far הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this
וּלְמָכִ֖יר <WH4353> unto Machir נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> And I gave אֶת־ <WH853> הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> Gilead

וְלָרֻאוּבֵנִ֨י <WH7206> And unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֜י <WH1425> and unto the Gadites נָתַ֤תִּי <WH5414> I gave מִן־ <WH4480> from הַגִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> from Gilead וְעַד־ <WH5704> far נַ֣חַל <WH5158> even unto the river אַרְנֹ֔ן <WH769> Arnon תּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> half הַנַּ֖חַל <WH5158> the valley וּגְבֻ֑ל <WH1366> and the border וְעַד֙ <WH5704> far יַבֹּ֣ק <WH2999> Jabbok הַנַּ֔חַל <WH5158> even unto the river גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> [which is] the border בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וְהָֽעֲרָבָ֖ה <WH6160> The plain וְהַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <WH3383> also and Jordan וּגְבֻ֑ל <WH1366> and the coast מִכִּנֶּ֗רֶת <WH3672> [thereof] from Chinnereth וְעַ֨ד <WH5704> far יָ֤ם <WH3220> even unto the sea הָֽעֲרָבָה֙ <WH6160> of the plain יָ֣ם <WH3220> sea הַמֶּ֔לַח <WH4417> [even] the salt תַּ֛חַת <WH8478> the foot אַשְׁדֹּ֥ת <WH794> of the slopes הַפִּסְגָּ֖ה <WH6449> of Pisgah מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <WH4217> eastward

וָאֲצַ֣ו <WH6680> And I commanded אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> you at that time הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֗ם <WH430> your God נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> hath given לָכֶ֜ם אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> you this land הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> likewise לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <WH3423> to possess חֲלוּצִ֣ים <WH2502> armed תַּֽעַבְר֗וּ <WH5674> it ye shall pass over לִפְנֵ֛י <WH6440> before אֲחֵיכֶ֥ם <WH251> your brethren בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> all [that are] meet חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> for the war

רַ֠ק <WH7535> But נְשֵׁיכֶ֣ם <WH802> But your wives וְטַפְּכֶם֮ <WH2945> and your little ones וּמִקְנֵכֶם֒ <WH4735> and your cattle יָדַ֕עְתִּי <WH3045> ([for] I know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מִקְנֶ֥ה <WH4735> and your livestock רַ֖ב <WH7227> that ye have much לָכֶ֑ם יֵֽשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> in בְּעָ֣רֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5892> in your cities אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> which I have given לָכֶֽם׃

עַ֠ד <WH5704> until אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יָנִ֨יחַ <WH5117> have given rest יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> Until the LORD לַֽאֲחֵיכֶם֮ <WH251> unto your brethren כָּכֶם֒ וְיָרְשׁ֣וּ <WH3423> as well as unto you and [until] they also possess גַם־ <WH1571> also הֵ֔ם <WH1992> like אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֛ם <WH430> your God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> hath given לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> them בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> them beyond הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> Jordan וְשַׁבְתֶּ֗ם <WH7725> and [then] shall ye return אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> every man לִֽירֻשָּׁת֔וֹ <WH3425> unto his possession אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> which I have given לָכֶֽם׃

וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹשׁ֣וּעַ <WH3091> Joshua צִוֵּ֔יתִי <WH6680> And I commanded בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying עֵינֶ֣יךָ <WH5869> Thine eyes הָרֹאֹ֗ת <WH7200> have seen אֵת֩ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֜ה <WH6213> hath done יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> all that the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶם֙ <WH430> your God לִשְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> unto these two הַמְּלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> kings הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> to these כֵּֽן־ <WH3651> so יַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> do יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> so shall the LORD לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַמַּמְלָכ֔וֹת <WH4467> unto all the kingdoms אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you עֹבֵ֥ר <WH5674> whither thou passest שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> in it

לֹ֖א <WH3808> not תִּֽירָא֑וּם <WH3372> Ye shall not fear כִּ֚י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> them for the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God ה֖וּא <WH1931> he הַנִּלְחָ֥ם <WH3898> he shall fight לָכֶֽם׃ ס
וָאֶתְחַנַּ֖ן <WH2603> And I besought אֶל־ <WH413> with יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> O Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> You הַֽחִלּ֙וֹתָ֙ <WH2490> thou hast begun לְהַרְא֣וֹת <WH7200> to shew אֶֽת־ <WH853> עַבְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> thy servant אֶ֨ת־ <WH853> גָּדְלְךָ֔ <WH1433> thy greatness וְאֶת־ <WH853> יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> hand הַחֲזָקָ֑ה <WH2389> and thy mighty אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who מִי־ <WH4310> what אֵל֙ <WH410> for what God בַּשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> [is there] in heaven וּבָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> or in earth אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> that can do כְמַעֲשֶׂ֖יךָ <WH4639> according to thy works וְכִגְבוּרֹתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1369> and mighty

אֶעְבְּרָה־ <WH5674> I pray thee let me go over נָּ֗א <WH4994> pray וְאֶרְאֶה֙ <WH7200> and see אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> land הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> the good אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> is בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> that [is] beyond הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> Jordan הָהָ֥ר <WH2022> mountain הַטּ֛וֹב <WH2896> that goodly הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> he וְהַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <WH3844> and Lebanon
